title: Nami - Light of Abyss - Skin Idea
body:
Dear Riot Team and LoL Players,

In summer  2014 i drew a kind of Nami skin, its noting special but my friends "forced" me to send it on RIOT. 
Well, i fixed some details and here it is :) maybe it give you guys a little inspiration for a new Nami Skin.

Contect me on my Facebook page [MooniceArt](https://www.facebook.com/MooniceArt) if you have any questions.

Nice Greetings
Natalie Doehler aka Moonice

replies.body: HNNNNNGHHHH I need dis! ;_;

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Galetta,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=a9hYqZEo,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-01-26T19:25:35.393+0000)
>
> HNNNNNGHHHH I need dis! ;_;

Yooo i played with you the other day O.o i was gnar u were zyra xD.

on the topic would buy that nami skin lol, it really nice
Me playing Zyra?! ......True facts. {{champion:143}}

True facts, lol!

Reminds me of fate/cero on youtube.
Nami is one of my mains. 10/10 would play!

replies.poster: O o b l e c k
replies.body:
Water wonderful skin!

Sea what I did there?

*sigh*

http://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/54754003.jpg





(upvoted though :P)
Very pretty. But maybe her eyes should have no pupils, and she should also probably have that bioluminescent dangly thing that anglerfish have.
And big, spooky, sharp teeth! Please! :D
http://img.pandawhale.com/61427-George-Takei-oh-my-gif-Dzvp.gif

Nami would do well to have a darker skin, and this one is designed beautifully while keeping her grace and 'morality' intact.

Nami is one of my most played champs, and if she had a skin that looked like this or similar to this, it'd likely be my main skin choice for her. Great work. :)
That looks really nice. 10/10 would buy.

> [{quoted}](name=Phobophobiia,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=a9hYqZEo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-26T11:04:58.688+0000)
>
> That looks really nice. 10/10 would buy.

Not the only one :0
It's awesome, I love it *-* Would totally buy this one O:
I would buy too
I'm already thinking about playing her because of her unique water ult, but with this skin it would be better
This looks super cool!
As a Nami main....yes pls!
I've been waiting for a good nami skin. i love playing her, but i dont really LOVE any of her skins. I would def buy this if it were legit.
10/10 would buy
Nice!
All of my yes.
Absolutely beautiful
My wallet is waiting for this Nami skin
Could always use more Nami skins and this one is fantastic. Riot pls.
10/10 Would Instabuy
oh i would insta buy this man this is beautiful
Yeah Queen Nami dominating let's make this skin happen riot we need Nami to be the new veigar in terms of skins
Nami is one of my fav supports, and I love all abyss related themes, so I approve! :D Never has a deep sea fish looked so cute.
This one is amazing. Truly!
.. this skin is beautiful
Congrats with the red post. Awesome concept.
Nice and shiny
The name of the skin SCARES AND CONFUSES KNALXZ!
This is a really beautiful concept and I think it would fit Nami really well! I would definitely buy it.
beautiful, although I'm still keeping my hopes up for Sea Witch Nami
That is really awesome. This skin would make me strongly consider getting Nami.
How does this only have 3 upvotes atm this is amazing rito pls!
